title: Solana Company Ramps Up Staking Push With Institutional Validators as Shares Tumble
contentSnippet: Even as its shares plunge, Solana Company says market volatility is a chance to prove conviction in its Solana-based treasury model.

title: a16z eyes $10B in new funds, but leaves crypto behind despite bullish talk
contentSnippet: Andreessen Horowitz is reportedly raising around $10 billion for new AI and defense investments, notably excluding crypto, despite its bullish stance on decentralization.

title: Morning Minute: Crypto Caught in Middle of Democrat vs Republican Battle
contentSnippet: It's getting heated in DC, and the crypto industry is stuck in the middle—perhaps a sign of what's to come as it becomes more politicized.

title: Ledger's Latest Nano Crypto Hardware Wallet Offers a Punch of Personality
contentSnippet: The Ledger Nano Gen5 is totally redesigned and features exclusive badges from legendary Apple icon designer, Susan Kare.

title: Turkey’s $200B crypto boom is built on speculation, not adoption: Chainalysis
contentSnippet: Turkey’s $200 billion crypto market leads the MENA region, but has been fueled more by speculative activity than by sustainable adoption, according to Chainalysis.

title: 野村系レーザーデジタル、投資ファンドをSeiブロックチェーンでトークン化
contentSnippet: 野村傘下レーザーデジタルのファンドがセイ上でトークン化。カイオ経由でブラックロックやブレバン・ハワードなどグローバル大手と並ぶ機関投資家向けRWA商品として展開。

title: WazirX to Resume Trading and Withdrawals More Than a Year After $234M Hack
contentSnippet: The platform will restart operations with a phased approach and new BitGo custody partnership following court-sanctioned restructuring.

title: Risk Proxies Challenge Bitcoin's Bounce; HYPE, XMR Shine: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 23, 2025

title: Ripple co-founder keeps ‘cashing out’ at the highs: Will it hurt XRP price?
contentSnippet: Ripple co-founder and former CEO Chris Larsen has amassed millions in realized profits from XRP since 2018, potentially putting the price recovery at risk.

title: Revolut secures MiCA license in Cyprus to launch Europe-wide crypto services
contentSnippet: Revolut also revealed its Crypto 2.0 platform, which will feature over 280 tokens, zero-fee staking up to 22% APY and 1:1 stablecoin-to-US dollar conversion.

title: Ethereum Whale Scoops Up $32M in ETH as Bitcoin, Solana Whales Cash Out
contentSnippet: The Ethereum whale buy signals institutional interest, analysts said, while a Solana whale dumped $93M, showing a shift in market preference.

title: EU sanctions Russian A7A5 stablecoin and crypto exchanges
contentSnippet: Russian oil companies have increasingly relied on digital assets and crypto platforms to circumvent financial sanctions, according to the European Commission.

title: WazirX bets on zero-fee crypto trading to drive relaunch after long hiatus
contentSnippet: WazirX’s phased comeback begins Friday, offering 30 days of zero-fee trading as the exchange rebuilds liquidity and trust after a long hiatus.

title: Revolut Secures MiCA License in Cyprus, Expanding Regulated Crypto Services Across EU
contentSnippet: Fintech giant gains CySEC approval to offer compliant crypto trading across 30 EEA markets under MiCA

title: Polymarket Seeks Investment at Valuation of $12B-$15B: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: That level would mark a more than 10-fold increase since June, when Polymarket raised $200 million at a $1 billion valuation.

title: CZ calls Peter Schiff’s tokenized gold a ‘trust me bro’ asset
contentSnippet: Peter Schiff reiterated that Bitcoin will “go to zero” and warned that the US dollar’s era as the global reserve currency is ending, predicting a return to a gold-based system.

title: Decentralized Exchange Bunni Pulls the Plug Following $8.4M Flash Loan Exploit
contentSnippet: The DEX lacks capital for a secure relaunch that would cost six to seven figures in audits alone, following the September hack.

title: Crypto Exchange KuCoin Launches Mining Pool for Dogecoin, Litecoin and Soon Bitcoin
contentSnippet: KuCoin has created a new mining pool service called KuPool, which includes support for Dogecoin, Litecoin, and eventually Bitcoin too.

title: Bunni DEX Shuts Down, Cites Recovery Costs After $8.4M Exploit
contentSnippet: The team cannot afford the cost of relaunching the protocol, which would require significant investment in audits and development.

title: Reddit Sues Perplexity AI, Alleging ‘Industrial-Scale’ Data Theft
contentSnippet: The social platform accused Perplexity and its data partners of unlawfully harvesting user content to train AI systems.

title: Quantum Solutions Adds 2K ETH to Become 11th-Largest Ether Treasury Company
contentSnippet: Quantum Solutions boosts ETH position as company cements standing among top digital asset treasuries, become No. 2 DAT outside U.S.

title: クオンタムソリューションズ、イーサリアム保有量で国内上場企業トップ
contentSnippet: 東京上場のクオンタムソリューションズが7日間で2365ETHを取得した。アーク・インベスト創業者ウッド氏も支持を表明。

title: Juggernaut in making? Polymarket’s valuation may jump 10x to $15B with new funding
contentSnippet: Polymarket continues to expand its mainstream reach with new partnerships, teaming up with DraftKings, the NHL and OpenAI’s World project.

title: Canada’s Anti-Money Laundering Watchdog Levies Record $126M Fine on Cryptomus
contentSnippet: Fintrac said the firm was fined for unreported activity including transactions tied to child sexual abuse material, fraud, ransomware payments and sanctions evasion.

title: If Bitcoin isn’t ‘crypto,’ what makes it different?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s design, governance and regulation set it apart from crypto. From supply rules to ETFs, it now sits in a category of its own.

title: Bunni DEX becomes second crypto project to shut this week
contentSnippet: Bunni has decided to re-license its v2 smart contracts from Business Source License to MIT license, allowing developers to use all the features developed by Bunni, garnering praise.

title: BTC, XRP, SOL, ADA Hold Flat as Google’s Quantum Breakthrough Rekindles Old Crypto Fears
contentSnippet: October is on track to deliver the least gains for investors since 2015, despite being a seasonally bullish month.

title: ポリマーケット、米大手スポーツベッティングと提携　予測市場インフラ提供へ
contentSnippet: 予測市場大手ポリマーケットが米スポーツベッティング大手ドラフトキングスの清算機関に指定。競合カルシとの競争激化の中、B2C市場に加えB2B事業で新たな収益源を確保。NY証取の親会社から20億ドルの投資も受け事業拡大を加速。

title: アーサーヘイズのビットコイン100万ドル予想、高市政権の積極財政は市場の起爆剤になり得るか？
contentSnippet: BitMEX創業者アーサー・ヘイズ氏が、高市新政権の物価高対策によりビットコイン価格が100万ドル(約1.5億円)に達すると予測した。同氏は景気刺激策の推進が、日銀の量的緩和（QE）への転換につながると見ている。

title: ルミス米上院議員、仮想通貨アプリを後押しするオープンバンキング規則設立求める
contentSnippet: 米ルミス上院議員がCFPBにオープンバンキング規則の策定を要請した。銀行口座と仮想通貨取引所を接続するAPI活用で迅速な送金を目指す。大手銀行の反対姿勢も指摘した。

title: WazirX to Restart Trading on Friday After $230M Hack Caused Year-Long Shutdown
contentSnippet: That was the final step in a process that began after a massive security breach last year froze assets, shuttered withdrawals, and effectively took India’s oldest crypto platform offline.

title: Is Bitcoin Headed for a Crash Below $100K? ‘Grand Daddy’ Volume Indicator Hits Lowest Since April
contentSnippet: A key volume indicator points to underlying market weakness, signaling a potential bitcoin sell-off below $100,000

title: リミックスポイント、株式希薄化を伴わない仮想通貨購入方針を決議
contentSnippet: 株式会社リミックスポイントは10月23日、2026年6月まで株式発行による暗号資産購入を行わない方針を決議。今後は手元資金等を活用し、既存株主への希薄化を回避する。

title: Paxos Co-Founder Calls 'Transparency' a Silver Lining Following $300T Stablecoin Snafu
contentSnippet: The Paxos CEO attempted to reframe the minting incident as validation of blockchain technology's transparency benefits.

title: XRP Price Structure Tightens Between $2.33 and $2.44 Ahead of Volatility Break
contentSnippet: Traders are watching for a breakout above $2.41 or a decline below $2.33 to signal the next directional move.

title: Hyperliquid Token Defies Bitcoin Slump as Wall Street Fund Moves In
contentSnippet: HYPE climbed after a Nasdaq biotech firm struck an $888 million deal to create a new company set to hold and buy more of the token.

title: ビットコインは弱含みで推移、米コインベースとロビンフッドにBNB上場へ
contentSnippet: ビットコインは10万8000ドル台で弱含みの推移。米大手取引所CoinbaseとRobinhoodが相次いでBNB上場を発表し、規制環境の変化を示す歴史的な動きとして注目を集めている。一方、トランプ関税ショックで巨額利益を上げた大口投資家が再び大規模なショートポジションを構築しており、市場は警戒感を強めている。

title: 米民主党議員ら、トランプ政権中東特使に仮想通貨開示要求　利益相反を指摘
contentSnippet: 米民主党議員らがウィトコフ中東特使に保有する仮想通貨などについて情報提供を求めた。トランプ一族のWLFI関連で利益相反の可能性を指摘している。

title: ハイパーリキッド・ストラテジーズ、最大約1500億円調達をSECに提出　HYPEトークン購入含む
contentSnippet: ナスダック上場のハイパーリキッド・ストラテジーズが最大10億ドル（約1,500億円）の資金調達を目指すS-1をSECに提出した。HYPEトークン購入を含む。7月設立後、早くも大規模増資計画。

title: 計2600億円相当のビットコイン、ハッキングされたLuBian関連のウォレットから移動
contentSnippet: 計2600億円超相当の仮想通貨ビットコインが、マイニングプールLuBianに関連するウォレットから移動。トランザクションは4つに分けられて別々のアドレスに送金されている。
